column4: How can I make it so the minimum fan speed always gets set after turning on my machine and after waking from sleep? To do it manually I do 'echo "4500" | sudo tee /sys/devices/platform/applesmc.768/fan1_min'.
add a 'echo "4500" > /sys/devices/platform/applesmc.768/fan1_min' to your resume script
depends on what you use to suspend
